result.eng: On both sides of the river.
result.ga: Ar dhá thaobh na habhann
result.orig: Ar dhá thaobh na habhann
result.html: Ar dhá thaobh na habhannOn both sides of the river.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḋá ṫaoḃ na haḃannOn both sides of the river.

result.eng: I'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ga: B'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.orig: B'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamh
result.html: B'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh den fhoirgneamhI'd rather stay inside the building.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟearr liom fanaċt taoḃ istiġ den ḟoirgneaṁI'd rather stay inside the building.

result.eng: I would like to say something about that.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sin
result.html: Ba mhaith liom rud éigin a rá ina thaobh sinI would like to say something about that.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom rud éigin a rá ina ṫaoḃ sinI would like to say something about that.

result.eng: You will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.
result.ga: Beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráide
result.orig: Beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráide
result.html: Beidh ort íoc as páirceáil ar thaobh na sráideYou will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ ort íoc as páirceáil ar ṫaoḃ na sráideYou will have to pay for parking on the side of the street.

result.eng: What are they saying about us?
result.ga: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobh
result.orig: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobh
result.html: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobhWhat are they saying about us?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaoḃWhat are they saying about us?

result.eng: How does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ga: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil
result.orig: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoil
result.html: Conas a ullmhaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taobh amuigh den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?
result.ponchtml: Conas a ullṁaíonn an múinteoir na daltaí don saol taoḃ amuiġ den scoilHow does the teacher prepare the pupils for life outside school?

result.eng: You will see the house on your left-hand side.
result.ga: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe clé
result.orig: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe clé
result.html: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe cléYou will see the house on your left-hand side.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ tú an teaċ ar ṫaoḃ do láiṁe cléYou will see the house on your left-hand side.

result.eng: You should talk to your parents about it.
result.ga: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobh
result.html: Ní mór duit dul i gcomhairle le do thuismitheoirí ina thaobhYou should talk to your parents about it.
result.ponchtml: Ní mór duit dul i gcoṁairle le do ṫuismiṫeoirí ina ṫaoḃYou should talk to your parents about it.

result.eng: The noun and the adjective agree in gender.
result.ga: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne de
result.orig: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne de
result.html: Réitíonn an t-ainmfhocal agus an aidiacht ó thaobh inscne deThe noun and the adjective agree in gender.
result.ponchtml: Réitíonn an t-ainmḟocal agus an aidiaċt ó ṫaoḃ inscne deThe noun and the adjective agree in gender.

result.eng: Please stand behind the yellow line.
result.ga: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.orig: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoil
result.html: Seasaigí taobh thiar den líne bhuí le bhur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.
result.ponchtml: Seasaigí taoḃ ṫiar den líne ḃuí le ḃur dtoilPlease stand behind the yellow line.

result.eng: The mouse is on your right-hand side.
result.ga: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deise
result.orig: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deise
result.html: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deiseThe mouse is on your right-hand side.
result.ponchtml: Tá an luċóg ar ṫaoḃ do láiṁe deiseThe mouse is on your right-hand side.

result.eng: The country is outside the European Union.
result.ga: Tá an tír taobh amuigh den Aontas Eorpach
result.orig: Tá an tír taobh amuigh den Aontas Eorpach
result.html: Tá an tír taobh amuigh den Aontas EorpachThe country is outside the European Union.
result.ponchtml: Tá an tír taoḃ amuiġ den Aontas EorpaċThe country is outside the European Union.

result.eng: I live outside town.
result.ga: Tá mé i mo chónaí taobh amuigh den bhaile
result.orig: Tá mé i mo chónaí taobh amuigh den bhaile
result.html: Tá mé i mo chónaí taobh amuigh den bhaileI live outside town.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé i mo ċónaí taoḃ amuiġ den ḃaileI live outside town.

result.eng: I was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ga: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.orig: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an lae
result.html: Bhí mé i mo sheasamh taobh thiar den chuntar ar feadh an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé i mo ẛeasaṁ taoḃ ṫiar den ċuntar ar feaḋ an laeI was standing behind the counter all day.

result.eng: The children are waiting outside.
result.ga: Tá na páistí ag fanacht taobh amuigh
result.orig: Tá na páistí ag fanacht taobh amuigh
result.html: Tá na páistí ag fanacht taobh amuighThe children are waiting outside.
result.ponchtml: Tá na páistí ag fanaċt taoḃ amuiġThe children are waiting outside.

result.eng: It is raining, I'd rather stay in.
result.ga: Tá sé ag cur báistí b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh
result.orig: Tá sé ag cur báistí b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istigh
result.html: Tá sé ag cur báistí b'fhearr liom fanacht taobh istighIt is raining, I'd rather stay in.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag cur báistí b'ḟearr liom fanaċt taoḃ istiġIt is raining, I'd rather stay in.

result.eng: It is cold outside.
result.ga: Tá sé fuar taobh amuigh
result.orig: Tá sé fuar taobh amuigh
result.html: Tá sé fuar taobh amuighIt is cold outside.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé fuar taoḃ amuiġIt is cold outside.

result.eng: All you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ga: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.orig: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobh
result.html: Ní raibh le feiceáil ar an túr ach poll mór ina thaobhAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ le feiceáil ar an túr aċ poll mór ina ṫaoḃAll you could see on the building was a big hole in its side.

result.eng: Why was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ga: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.orig: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimh
result.html: Cén fáth an raibh deatach ag teacht ó dhá thaobh an fhoirgnimhWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?
result.ponchtml: Cén fáṫ an raiḃ deataċ ag teaċt ó ḋá ṫaoḃ an ḟoirgniṁWhy was smoke coming from both sides of the building?

result.eng: And if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ga: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.orig: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobh
result.html: Agus dá mba bhuama é caithfidh gur cheann ollmhór é a phléascfadh an foirgneamh amach ar dhá thaobhAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.
result.ponchtml: Agus dá mba ḃuama é caiṫfiḋ gur ċeann ollṁór é a ṗléascfaḋ an foirgneaṁ amaċ ar ḋá ṫaoḃAnd if it was a bomb, it must have been a huge one to explode out of the building on two sides.

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: Agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: Agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: Upon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ga: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.orig: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.html: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ponchtml: Ar a ḋul isteaċ go teaċ na scoile dó d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar ar gaċ taoḃ deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.

result.eng: Will the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
result.ga: An mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
result.orig: An mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
result.html: An mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobhWill the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
result.ponchtml: An mbeiḋ an ġrian mórán níos mó nuair a ḃeimid ag a taoḃWill the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
